com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.rcon.handlers

Class SourceRconPacketAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • com.ibasco.agql.core.transport.handlers.MessageInboundHandler
          • com.ibasco.agql.core.transport.handlers.MessageInboundDecoder
            • com.ibasco.agql.protocols.valve.source.query.rcon.handlers.SourceRconPacketAssembler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    public class SourceRconPacketAssembler
extends MessageInboundDecoder
    Re-assembles all SourceRconPacket split-packet back into a single SourceRconPacket instance.

    Note

    When terminator packets are enabled, we expect to receive two terminator packets with request id of -1 and with terminator byte of 0 then 1. This implementation expects only to receive a SINGLE terminator packet, because there are cases when an unauthenticated request is sent, then the server will only send a single terminator packet (with terminator value of 0) instead of two.
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco
    See Also:
    SourceRconOptions.USE_TERMINATOR_PACKET
